content.question: In lines 8-9 (Nec . . . Euris), we learn that the bees

choices.label: journey farther out when the weather is windy
remain close to their hives when bad weather threatens
are not weighed down by the rain
are no longer prevented from returning to their hives

content.answer: remain close to their hives when bad weather threatens

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
